# cook your code here
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    w = raw_input()
    count = 0
    for j in range(len(w)):
        if(w[j]=='B'):
            count = count+2
        elif(w[j]=='A' or w[j]=='R' or w[j]=='P' or w[j]=='O' or w[j]=='D' or w[j]=='Q' ):
            count = count+1
        else:
            pass
    print count
